{"step_by_step_thinking": "ZOE paste stands for Zinc Oxide Eugenol paste, which is commonly used in dentistry. Lenolin, also known as lanolin, is a type of wax derived from wool-bearing animals. It is often added to ZOE paste to decrease the irritation caused by eugenol, a compound that can cause irritation and sensitivity in some patients.", "answer_choice": "D"}
